price: Tí wọ́n bá tún fẹ́ tàn ọ́ jẹ, dájúdájú Allāhu á tó ọ. Òun ni Ẹni tí Ó fi àrànṣe Rẹ̀ àti àwọn onígbàgbọ́ òdodo ràn ọ́ lọ́wọ́.
arabic: وَإِن يُرِيدُوٓاْ أَن يَخۡدَعُوكَ فَإِنَّ حَسۡبَكَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَيَّدَكَ بِنَصۡرِهِۦ وَبِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
